thread.section_title: Current Analysis Reports - Business Technology and Software
thread.title: Dell to Consume EMC et al. in the Biggest Technology Buyout in History
thread.title_full: Dell to Consume EMC et al. in the Biggest Technology Buyout in History

author: Hill, Steven
title: Dell to Consume EMC et al. in the Biggest Technology Buyout in History
text: October 12, 2015 Rate this report Intelligence Alert Dell Inc. and Silver Lake have inked a definitive agreement to acquire EMC and all of its associated assets in a $67 billion deal that could be completed by mid-2016 and have sweeping consequences in the enterprise and SMB data center markets.
